clause_text: A church league softball game was scheduled about a month ago.
The game was to be held at the diamond at Homestead High School.

While driving on Twenty-four to turn at Ranch Eggs, the speaker had to slow down.
The speaker was using a turn signal while slowing down.
A man in his middle fifties started creeping onto Twenty-four, blocking the lane.
The man was attempting to merge into the same lane as the speaker.
The speaker managed to merge into the lane ahead of the man.
